players.name: Alice
memory: Bob: "I am the detective and I found out Alice is the mafioso."
Charlie: "I'm still trying to figure things out. Let's see what happens tonight."
Bob: "I will continue to investigate and gather more information. Let's see if Alice tries to eliminate anyone tonight, as that could confirm my suspicions."
You: "Bob is the detective, Diana was killed by me last night and I'm still alive. You can't trust anyone."
